definition: beauty contest/vying to be the most beautiful
handsome/refined/elegant/graceful/superior/show (loanword)/CL:場|场[chang2]/(literary) to grow/to bloom/(of crops) to produce ears

sentences.english: King show here, the peak-to-peak amazed, have their own characteristics, each withverve.
sentences.chinese: 這裏競秀，峯峯稱奇，各有特色，各具神韻。
